mapper.select: select research_project.id, rank_a.name as rankAName, rank_a1.name as rankA1Name, rp_project_source.name as rpProjectSourceName, k.k as k from research_project left join rank_a on rank_a_id = rank_a.id left join rank_a1 on rank_a1_id = rank_a1.id left join rp_classifi on classifi_id = rp_classifi.id left join rp_project_source on proj_sou_id = rp_project_source.id left join k on k_id = k.id;
